Row.Text: Receive free Great Scientist when you discover Philosophy. Earn Great Scientists 50% faster.

The Walls of Babylon are a Babylonian Unique Building, replacing the standard city Walls. The Walls of Babylon are cheaper to construct, and increase a city's Defense Strength by 6 and Hit Points by 100 (both significantly more than standard Walls).

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]The Walls of Babylon are a Babylonian Unique Building, replacing the standard city Walls. The Walls of Babylon are cheaper to construct, and increase a city's Defense Strength by 6 and Hit Points by 100 (both significantly more than standard Walls).

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](PL_PL text) [ENDCOLOR]The Walls of Babylon are a Babylonian Unique Building, replacing the standard city Walls. The Walls of Babylon are cheaper to construct, and increase a city's Defense Strength by 6 and Hit Points by 100 (both significantly more than standard Walls).

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](RU_RU text) [ENDCOLOR]The Walls of Babylon are a Babylonian Unique Building, replacing the standard city Walls. The Walls of Babylon are cheaper to construct, and increase a city's Defense Strength by 6 and Hit Points by 100 (both significantly more than standard Walls).
The Walls of Babylon increase the damage output of all the City's ranged attacks and increase the City's defense. More effective and also cheaper to construct than normal Walls they replace.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]The Walls of Babylon increase the damage output of all the City's ranged attacks and increase the City's defense. More effective and also cheaper to construct than normal Walls they replace.
